content.detailedDescription: These objects move every which way and are extremely fast.
content.summary: Several objects around our sun

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were camping with my dog at pine mountain campground off the 33 past ojai, ca. the campground is on the ridge of the mountain so you have views of behind and in front of the mountain. behind is a valley with farming and in front is a national park called rose valley and you can also see the ocean in the distance. from where our tents were the hill continued to go up and peaked at a rock formation which we went to see the view of our surroundings and to observe the stars before we went to bed. it was pitch black out, there are no lights up there, and the valleys below on both sides have minimal light. i was facing the direction of the ocean with my dog and my friend faced me, looking the opposite direction down into the valley below. the mountain range continued at a level height on either side of where we were so you could see (during the day) through the trees quite a ways. however, at this time we could not see 5 feet in front of us. my friend said "hey, do you see those lights?" and pointed behind me. i said "that's not funny" as i turned around to look below and told him it was probably a house or a car in the valley but he pointed next to us instead and said "no, over there through the trees." i looked to my right and said 6 red lights moving around, side to side, and around each other almost in the shape of an infinity sign but they started morphing into each other going from 6 to 5 to 4 to 3 and then back up to 6 for about a minute or so. we observed them and at first i thought it was another camp ground but this ridge was above any of the designated camp grounds and we only saw campers in the other direction during the day. once they started moving i knew it wasn't a camp fire due to their fast movements and they were about 5-10 feet up in the air. after a few times of them increasing and decreasing in number they suddenly stopped at three, got in a straight line, and then seemed as if they were coming closer to us, as if they centered in on us and were coming closer. they must of only been about 200 feet away but at that point i got scared and my dog started growling so i ran over the rock formation back down the hill to our tents and yelled at my friend to follow. our tents were only 30 feet from the rock formation but i got into my tent with my dog, and my friend went into his tent, and we tried to fall asleep. as i layed there my dog kept looking in the direction of the lights and growled every so often until i fell asleep. today, i was watching ufo hunters, the episode on the tinsley park lights in illinois and honestly what i saw was so similar in shape and color that i am once again amazed at what i saw and also what people world wide have seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3-6 red lights on a mountain ridge at 7,500ft

content.detailedDescription: I was heading home on highway 75 (south) before i went under gordon drive bridge i seen 5 lights shining. i though oh a helicopter. nope as i got ckose it grew larger, larger then a plane in the sky, as i was going almost under bridge i was able to see under it there was no other lights then the 5 in a straight line. it was shaped like a triangle. when i got out of under the bridge i had to double check what i seen. it was seriously bigger then a air plane. when i turned east it disapered.
content.summary: I was heading south on 75 shaped like a triangle with only one side of lights and it was going north. was able to go under it thats how i know for a fact it was a triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing out on the porch observing the sky. it was a very clear night and the sky was filled with stars. red bright light object, oval shaped , taller than wide, approached from the sw. made no noise. appeared to be the size of the body of a helicopter. came within 500 ft, about 5 stories high in the sky, stopped and hovered. no noise at all. the shine (like rays of the sun) came off the object at  a 45 degree angle. 10 rays. then it started to move straight up at a consistent speed. we watched it until it
was no longer visible. it took about 45 seconds before it was no loner visible.
content.summary: Approached, hovered for approx 4 mins, then ascended. very clear night. watched ascend until no longer visible..

content.detailedDescription: Seen bright light in sky when having morning coffee. look out window to see smaller craft coming from larger one.Has seen 3 smaller craft hovering about 1000yards from the larger one . asked wife to get up and come see what i was seeing.We both had taken are cell phones out had taken videos of what we were seeing. went out side to get bus for work and could still see larger one in the sky.Wife was still watching it for about 20 minutes after i had left home was texting her on cell phone. she said that it was coming closer to her the she could no longer see it. the lights on the larger craft where bright and in the shape of a ring on its side and flashing sequentially, the smaller craft were the like the larger one. the smaller ones moved vary fast as they darted across the sky and stop and hovered. had first see them at 5:50 am it was dark out side and my wife said that stop seeing them 6:30 am.
content.summary: See bright light in sky when having morning coffee from kitchen table. seen a smaller crafts coming from larger one. ask my wife to come see what i was seeing and both of us tryed with cell phones to get pitchers of craft.

content.detailedDescription: My adult daughter and i were driving east on hwy 80 in brandon, ms and we both saw a white ball speeding east in the dark sky at about 8:30 pm.  it appeared to be on a long trajectory to hit earth at some distance away and was lost to the horizon in seconds.  there was no apparent tail but felt that it could have been a crashing airplane or something from space.  the only other thing that i have ever seen traveling at this speed was a returning space shuttle in the daytime which was trailing smoke.  the local news media did not report anyone seeing what we saw.  i am unable to speculate on the altitude or actual size of the object however from my point of vision the ball was about the size of an aspirin or m&m candy.  i did not report what i saw except this report
content.summary: High speed straight ball of bright white without tail traveling west to east. thought it was crashing airplane or space junk and think it was going as fast as a landing space shuttle.

content.detailedDescription:
on november 28, 1985 i was near buckeye, wv getting ready to go caving the next day with a caving club from pennsylvania. the evening was clear, cool, and calm. around 10 pm several club members (including me) were standing in the parking lot of graham's motel along route 219 just north of buckeye, wv. we noticed a large object slowly move from north to south
down the greenbrier river valley. it made no sound. the nearest large airport was about 70 miles to the south. based on a topographic map that i had with me, i estimated that the object was 1,500 feet from us. the angular size of the object was about the width of my hand at arms length which is about 10 degrees (the width of 20 full moons end to end). i later calculated the size of the object to be approximately 275 feet in length. based on its vertical distance in the sky (15 degrees), i later estimated that the object was approximately 400 feet above the river valley. we watched it for about one minute as it glided south down the river valley. when the object moved to where the river valley narrowed and the surrounding hills became higher, the object tilted upward and went over a ridge not to be seen again. we watched it cover a distance of 1.5 miles in approximately one minute (speed approximately 90 mph). the object appeared to be either cylindrical or rectangular. the object had white lights along its side and back.  my first impression was that the white light was coming from windows and were not lights attached to the object. the light coming from the windows was quite bright but not blinding.  it was the purest white light i had ever seen. we were a group of credible people who have just seen something incredible. what was odd was just after the sighting we simply went back to our rooms without saying anything.  no one in the club talked about it that weekend or ever again. it was as if we were controlled from a distance not to remember what we had seen. i never really thought much or told anyone about the incident until 19 years later. i am currently a fi for mufon and recently felt a conviction to report the sighting. this is the only sighting that i have ever had in my life. i am currently attempting to contact some of the witnesses who shared this sighting with me 30 years ago.
content.summary: Large silent craft with windows seen at close range

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving up senator highway on my way home from work, late afternoon, mid august 2015.
i am a picture hound and will shoot everything in my path, and often use my cell phone, pointed in a general direction, so i can keep my eyes on the road. the clouds were really white and fluffy, so i pointed my phone in their direction to hopefully get some green tree tops and white clouds contrasting each other against the blue sky.
i didn't look at the pics for a few days. i save that for spare time. when i looked i was surprised to see something in the sky.
 i mulled it over for a few days and then sent it to a friend and asked her to blow it up and see what she thought it was. she said it looked like a ufo and that i should send it to mufon. 
 i am sure it's just a plane of some sort, but who knows.

a friend and i 'did' see something strange happen ( in nw ark. ) soon after the gulf war started. but that's totally different, and another place, another time.
content.summary: In sky over prescott nat'l forest. i only noticed it after i looked at the photos i took of the fluffy clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gotten out of work and for some bizarre reason said out loud "that's a plane" while walking to my car in the parking lot. i pulled out of my spot and turned around. i stopped to watch the plane for a minute but it wasn't going anywhere. the yellow light was blinking or pulsating and it seemed to be hovering, darting around back and forth and up and down slightly like a bug on water. i had seen this time of fluttering before and nobody ever takes the time to observe it with me. then i feel this odd sensation come over and hear the most peculiar sound, followed by a buzzing, ringing, indescribable sound. it was as if a book slammed and i felt very faint and the hairs on my arm were standing up. it was fear, but very hard to explain. there are people around me in the parking lot and i decide to begin driving home. during my drive i followed the busy street heading to my house but as i turned on the dimly lit back roads i started hearing the humming again. over the tree lines i saw around 3 very bright yellowish orbs, and one even appeared to be through the trees darting around..

i was panicked, and speeding, still hearing the noise and feeling very peculiar, foggy. right before i turned onto my street there is a small corn field which was recently cut and that's when i saw a sphere like disc with 4 visible yellow lights on the craft. it appeared so very close and it went directly over my car. i nearly called the police, but what would they do. i turned onto my street and ran into my house breathing fast, heart pounding and tears in my eyes because i never experienced that kind of fear. i went my whole life hoping to see a ufo and then i believe it actually happened to me and the feeling that the whole experience gave me was a strong fearful reaction. i wish i could have handled it differently, maybe even stopped my car on the last road to get out and look at the craft but all i wanted was to be in the protection of my own home. i felt very groggy following the incident and noticed i wasn't seeing clearly and felt a bit like my reality was warped. everything seemed delayed? i know that's not a very good description, and doesn't prove anything but i felt i had to share. thank you.
content.summary: Multiple ufo's

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching television around 9:30pm when i caught something bright flashing in the sky out my window.  i turned to look due north over quebec canada and saw this amazingly clear linear shaped object (like a rectangle on it's end) and it was changing colors quickly from red to green to blue to white and dancing around but in a fairly limited space.  then it moved quickly to the right, left, up and down within a few seconds.  it stayed in that one spot over approx. aylmer quebec for a long time, over a half hour, then it started to dart higher and to the west then back into the starting northern spot.  it seemed to have arms or something coming off the sides but not sure because it was moving so much hard to tell and it left contrails of light but they disappeared quickly of course leading into the next color.  there was no noise.

then i realized something else moved much higher but pretty close to the first bright object - there were at least two of these whitish/grey objects and they were moving as well but were much slower than the brightly colored one below and they seemed to be more oval shaped.  it felt almost as if the brighter flashy one was distracting while the others crept more slowly through the sky but in that same area for the most part.

now there were a lot of stars out last night, i hope they were stars, but some of them were so bright too i am not completely sure but they seemed more fixed.

i had a friend over to see them and she witnessed it all except wasn't with me for the clearest view of the multi colored one but she did see it too but when it was further away.  she described it as i did, through very goood binoculars i now have.

something else.  in the sky last night we saw 2 triangular shaped outlines, by that i mean there were 3 objects (stars? orbs?) one at each point creating the look of a triangle with one orb/star at each point of a triangle but not sure if they were part of one solid object or not.  it just seemed odd to see 3 bright lights forming triangles like that.  now my friend said she saw a couple of the stars in the triangles move a bit but i didn't so can't say for sure if they were part of a solid object or not.  just seemed odd.  now if they were part of a solid triangle then it was huge, like 2 football fields huge.

the multi-colored rectangular that was dancing around was something i have seen before in that same area about 2 years ago i would say, reported that to mufon as well.  i explained the appendages coming out the sides just like the one last night as well. same area over aylmer quebec. 

this is my 5th sighting of ufos over the last 2 or 3 years and all have taken place in this one same area.  not far from me is shirley's bay which has a ufo reputation and i understand there are magnetic fields in that area as well so i have read.  this is an active area for sure.

there were no jets around but there were 3 airplanes coming in for landings as sometimes they shift flight paths to the airport here that is south of ottawa but the airplanes are obvious, these objects i am reporting were definitely not planes.

like i said last night's sky was filled with stars but it would be easy to miss a ufo in the many stars for sure so there could have been far more than the 3 that i saw for sure that i know were ufos of some kind.  not including the possible triangle shaped star? points.
content.summary: First saw a flashing linear shaped object, very clear due north and it was flashing blue, green, red and white.   then saw 2 or 3 other objects above it quite high up but they were only white and shaped like ovals

content.detailedDescription:
I was bailing hay about dusk on the farm on shinbone ridge rd when i observed what i thought was a meter streak across the horizon in a south eastern direction. the thing that got my attention was maybe an hour or less later a jet fighter slowly crawled across the sky over the hayfield, he was so low i good see the silhouette of the pilot and the light in the cockpit. 

my thought was the lights in the field attracted the attention of the pilot, who was apparently looking for something. the jet was barley moving, almost in a hover mode, i would never have thought a jet could stay in the air moving that slow and low. 

the sheriff of our town advised many people complained that night reference low flying jets.

i'm really guessing at the date, i remember the circumstance, but not the date. i may be years off.
content.summary: Light streaks across horizon & jet fighter appears to be searching area.

content.detailedDescription: Every morning about 4:00 am bright white light appears. at daybreak 6:00 am,object slowly ascends until it disappears.I am looking at it with telescope but cannot tell what it is. i know its not a star. this has been going on for 2 weeks.It always shows up in the exact same area and ascends in the same upward path. i believe this is worth investigation.I hope mufon will help me get to the bottom of this oddity.Thank you for your time and i hope someone will get back to me.
content.summary: Object appears every morning about 4:00 am. ascends at daybreak

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in our backyard walking through our backyard heading in after covering our bonfire for the night and we noticed a large orange ball of light in the sky streaming from the southwest. it flew approximately 50 miles per hour overhead. i had time to grab my cell phone and try to record it but to no avail. it headed out over lake huron towards canada and we lost sight of it. i did not hear any sound from the object but my wife said she heard a hum or buzzing sound from the object.
content.summary: Orange glowing ball of light flying overhead without a trail behind flew overhead and headed off over lake huron

content.detailedDescription:
Had arrived at my farm 10 miles west of osawatomie, ks at 5:00 am. got out of vehicle and immediately noticed a very bright light to the east. went into shop and got my binoculars and the object appeared to be a solid object, long vertical shape like a tennis ball can. i took a few pics then tried to shoot pics through my binoculars, but couldn't. got out a small telescope to try to take pictures through. object had now changed shape to a bowl shape. took a few pics of bowl shape, but they just look like a round object via this set up. clouds obscured object for a couple of minutes. cleared for a couple of minutes. clouded again for a couple of minutes. cleared again and the object was gone. checked time at 5:47 am.


i'm on a hilltop with no lights on. object was around 20-25 degree above the horizon. could have been 10 - 20 miles away. object remained stationary for the most part.

i felt excitement about the sighting. i'm not a ufo hunter, but am open to investigating something in the sky when i see it. this is my first sighting of something odd.
content.summary: Extremely bright object hovering. binoculars revealed the object to be a verticle shaped cylinder of light

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving on route 66 to work from the plains va to manassas, observed a extremely bright light cone out of dark clouds make a really sharp turn toarch north east, it took it about 10 seconds to move across from maybe woodbridge va area to dulles airport area around, stoped and hover stay there till o lost site....
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed coming out of clouds sharp turn toarch dulles airport

content.detailedDescription: arrived at friends apartment on parking lot to see what i thought was a police helicopter with spot light derected at me from next building over. telling friend that police herassment again then ask him if he could see the rotor blades or tail. then there was no noise too. as i kept my eye on it as it drifted across parking lot to the south, the spot light effect was still the same and then as it went up shrinking down to size of venis and paused there for a few seconds as it seemed to change shape like liquid metal yet hard to describe. took off into space mega fast. gone.
content.summary: Pobe

content.detailedDescription:
This time my wife woke me up, to say your light in the sky is there again.

now we have not seen it for some mths. 2 yrs ago it was there in the same 

area. it was by my wife and myself for some 18 mths. we even saw it from our window on  various holidays, and now its back.
content.summary: Bright round light

content.detailedDescription:
We saw 100-200 lights, very bright and each one different color, red, green, blue and they pulsed sometime quick and some long pulse and some solid. a string 10 wide or so and miles long like a flock of birds moving slower than a plane. moved north then like a stream turning west for a long ways then turned nw. when they turned west 1 single light turned east and continued east. the photo does not show what we saw, it was 100 times more lights and colors very bright, we took several pictures but only one showed them.
they all turned at the same spot but different times as they each reached the spot they turned so some still going north until they get to spot. 
i made a copy of picture and used paint program to put arrows on it, other picture is untouched.
like i said picture is nothing compared to what we saw with our eyes
content.summary: Over 100 lights bright like christmas lights in a stream moving across sky

content.detailedDescription: The sky was clear but it was dark seeing the orange glow in the sky got my camera and snapped a picture on my phone and i have the picture it happened at 9:30 at night we were coming back from krogers grocery store it with me and my mom i was excited and amazed the object vanished
content.summary: orange pulsated

content.detailedDescription:
I was in class in downtown l.A when a friend came in and told me what he was looking at something in the sky so we went up on the roof of the 4 story building i was attending class in and he pointed up and i saw the object at first we weren't sure what is was but we had an idea what it was and when we saw the other two we knew what we were looking at it was a glowing white ball just hovering and then it moved quickly west then stopped again and then another one appeared next to it to the west they both just floated for a minute or so then the first object decended and then went back up really quick. at that time a bigger object appeared to the north/ west and you could see the grayness of the craft. it had flat, long lights in the back or all the way around it( i'm not sure). we watched all three hover for approximately 5 or 6 minutes and then the second object disappeared. at that time all my focus went to the big one to the north/east and it would hover in a half moon motion up and down at that time i took some pictures. we watched for a few more minutes then i had to go back to class. when we went inside both objects were still hovering.

note: two huge passenger planes went by flying north
content.summary: Was looking up with a friend, one came into view and then another then a third and then #2 disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Please see video
content.summary: Objects moved irradiclly then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: The night before the abduction, "enlightenment" is what i feel it was, i was traveling back to covert, michigan from elkhart, indiana on a two lane backroad, route m140. when all of a sudden everything on the car just went out, it went dead. it was so dark i could not see my hand in front of my face. i could see one farm house two or more miles away because it had a floodlight on it. there were no other cars or lights to be seen. the downside of it was i had no flashlight or a lighter and sat wondering what am i going to do. i was afraid to get out of the car because of the tremendous amount of roadkill i saw on the way to elkhart during the day. i feel the entities must have sensed my apprehensions and just as quick as everything went out they came back on and i continued on my way. i feel they decided not to take me at that moment. the following night i would return to missouri using us 95 west, to us 80 west, to us 55 south. when traveling on us 80 i could clearly see to the southeast the full moon. after a short time, thru the line of trees on the opposite side of the highway something caught my eye. i thought it was the full moon but i could not see thru the line of trees clearly. i was keeping my eye on the road and trying to see what was that. i was moving at 65 mph down the highway and kept trying to see was it the full moon or something else. that is the last thing i can recall while driving on us 80, just outside of chicago. my very next memory was slowly and calmly opening my eyes, my head was down and i could see i had two hands on the steering wheel where i normally put them. i slowly and calmly raised my head and looked out the front window and could see that the car was moving 55 to 65 mph down the highway. the car was going so straight down the highway that it was unnatural to me. how can this car be going so straight with me waking up from sleeping and i was not jumpy or nervous, nothing.I never got tired. i was calm and bewildered. i had know idea where i was or how i fell asleep. i immediately started looking for some signs along the highway and saw one that said i was now on us 55 south near bloomington, illinois. i figured out later that i was at least 250 miles from my last memory. as i continued down the highway i came to this farm road overpass and as soon as i got by it something across the highway caught my eye. behind this farm house with only maybe 1/7 of it showing and illuminated the color of a full moon, i could see something maybe 6 or 7 feet above the ground. slowly this spacecraft started moving from behind this farm house while i was applying the brakes and moving onto the shoulder of the highway. my window was up and i rolled it down because i had to make sure it was not a reflection on the glass, as the car finally came to a stop, i got out and continued to watch this spacecraft slowly reveal itself. once it was fully exposed, it stopped and just hovered for about 10 to 20 seconds, it was metallic and self illuminating, light expanded outward from it like a force field, yet a source of that light around it could not be seen. then suddenly while still the same height from the ground started moving to my left and started to get smaller. i say that because it was moving so straight and the shape of it was so detailed and uniform, i could not tell that it was moving away from me. it was like i was looking at something in 2d, on a flat screen. it took me 2 years to realize that it got smaller because it was moving away from me. i was so confident in what i was seeing,  my minds eye would let me see that it was moving away. the farm road overpass was elevated and stretched for maybe a 1/2 mile or more. the spacecraft moved over miles of flat farm land before it disappeared behind the elevated by earth farm road. during the time that the aliens had me, i can't recall anything..I feel that it was more of an enlightenment than an abduction..All i know is that they gave me enough info that lead me to seek and you shall find and once you know the truth, the truth shall set me free. i figured they wanted to make sure i revived or awoke ok. the car was never the same. whenever a screw or bolt from anywhere on the car was removed the hole it came out of moves and the screw or bolt will not go back in. i forgot to mention that it was not a bad experience because i can't recall anything and i got home two hours ahead of time..They wipe your memory for a reason and i can live with that. i have saw other spacecraft up close with detail that if you are interested i can tell you those details and draw pics. i also saw a documentary that had some air force pilots that saw one of the same crafts i saw and the animation is so accurate i was overwhelmed with emotion. thank you for your time and peace be with you.
content.summary: It was illuminated and metallic. light projected outward from it like a comic book transparent force field

content.detailedDescription: Was outside observing the night sky like i always like to do. before me and my cat decided to come in. i seen this large object coming from east to the west of where i live. biggest thing i have ever observed. i been seeing planes since i been out. this was no plane. 3 large white lights. it was moving slowly. tried to film it. but didn't get much of anything. but i went back out to see if i could see it again. but didn't.
content.summary: Seen a boomerang shape object. going from east to west with 3 large white lights.

content.detailedDescription: I am a very honored and i guess you can say blessed abductee. i know a lot about extraterrestrials but this experience i have to share with world is absolutely incredible. i would love to explain my story here in this area. but i have so much details and description to write, honestly, id be here writing fir days. its faster and easier to just tell it. i wasnt sure who to reach out to befire until i found mufon. this experience i have to share is completely unordinary and completely unheard of. i have done a lot of reading on others abduction experiences and mine is extremely different. i even feel i was brought to another planet and/or solar system, but it felt like a dream when i woke up at home. but i know it was real. i really really need to get in contact with someone about this to fully share my entire story. because i think i could really shed some light on a lot of ufo history by my experience. i was shown a lot that nobody really understands or knows about. theres still a lot of questions i have and things i still dint understand about my experience. my experience is six hours long in great descriptive detail that i can only really explain in person. please im reaching out and i dont know who else to turn to. i want to talk with someone one on one. i can also give a lot of unheard of and silenced information about planet nibiru, blue eyed blondes, and a new alien war waging between various alien races and human beings. things that nobody knows about and need to know. im not afraid to voice any of this publicly. i will. but i need help. please help me mufon.
content.summary: Theres no short way to explain

content.detailedDescription:
The 3 objects can been seen on very clear nights, because they are way past the moon.  they have 3 lites that circle them.  must use high power viewer to see them.  anther nite a big dark cloud appeared lite came down and back up and cloud disappeared in abt 5 secnds.  come to az and i will show you them and they are right in front of us in plain sight.
i see it in the dark deep skies in wickenburg area looking at the beautiful stars.  there are 3 very very white stars grouped together that gleam/glisten white intensely.  without high power viewers they look like some ordinary but sparkling white and stand out from the rest. they are there all nit long and every night.  cant believe no one has seen them.  when i show other people they cant believe what they are seeing.
content.summary: Have had several exp.  there are 3 that watch us from the stars nightly

content.detailedDescription: I went to bed late last night at 1:00 because i could not sleep, i got up at 8:30 am and noticed it was very cold put on a warm blanket and went back to sleep; i had what i thought was a very lucid dream except it was real!  the dream started out i was back in the u.S. amy and i was stationed in germany, for some reason i was living off post.    i went out with a man and he was 6 feet dark hair, glass, dark eyes tanned skin and thin but muscular built.    he came back to my apartment with me and we talked but we did it telepathically, he kept exposing his chest and i thought he was being sexual, but he wasnt.  we talked on my bed for an hour and he sent a message, please touch me and i did; i realized i could feel this man and this was not a dream!   the man had human like skin!  i woke up and was scared at what had happened, the room and i were very hot.  the cat came back into the room and were now on my bed with me.  (when i was up earlier the cats all 3 of them had left the room and would not come back in!    i can still see this mans face.  i also, noticed i thought it was friday, it was only 1:23 pm on tuesday; i thought it was later.   (i feel i lost track of time)! the guy also told me or telepathically sent to me all of his kind are males and they all looked lit they had diagonal rib cages like this >!
content.summary: Touched the entity and telepathicaly talked to it.

content.detailedDescription:
Recently i keep seeing them, it is like they are searching for something near my house. within two weeks i have seen them 4-5 times. i am scared and but intriged.I saw one again tonight. followed it to see if i was crazy and i saw it land. it is always the same type of vessel. and they don't mind coming very close to use almost in contact. first it fly normal and you could almost not notice the difference between a plaine. then it stops and stays put. then it might change direction a couple times looking for a place to land. before it disappear bright reds lights flash out it's rear and you can see it no more. the vessel has a curb and triangular shape . it is  hard to see what type of material because it stays always in flottation high enough yopu won't see with your naked eye. but you can notice by the way it navigates that it is not normal. white and red lights are under and around. most of the time it will be the only thing you see. when it lands something very bright and angular comme out of first vessel. a stretch of light connect both vessels. it is impressive to see how the brigth vessel is much larger and comes out of the first one which is it much smaller.But maybe the distortion cause by the brigth lights makes it appear small. i don't know how. but it happens to me all the time recently. the first vessel always stays in altitude up 10-20 feet above the other one while the other part lands. it is so brigt it tickles the eyes and you can hardley see if anything comes out it is brigther than anything i have seen and spakles alot millions of l<small lights tinkles to creat a form that might be a vessel. i don't want to go closer but i can show you where they landed the first and second time. they are always around the same time and hardley hide. i have never seen any activity of this kind before. but since the beggining of septembre they are always around my place. i think it is because i live near the airport.But honestly there is a big difference between a plane and what i have seen. human engineering don't fly this way!

first time it appeared it was at a music concert. it went over the crowd and stared at the the stage, while a country band played. it was very close to us but high enough to make it look like a plane. it was at a air ballon festival. lots of air ballon in the sky all week-end long. we could see it was very large 60 feet wide maybe. my mom, my step dad and me stared wonderin what this vessel was and only understood what it was when it decided to leave. as well as sevral people on the site we have seen this vessel with white and red lights. i was sure i was going to hear about it the next day. lasted couple of seconds and flied in swirls and disapeared. how can so many people see that and not talk about it. did not see one mention in the internet or the news the next day that was sunday 6 sept 2015. the next day saw them again near the airport were i live, they landed same as tonight. one vessel on top and bright part comes out.In a crop field near the highway. tried to take a picture while driving on the highway near but nothing good came out. with my phone i can barely see what i pictured one little white dot. but i could see mant ligths and the shape of it. that means nothing since it can't prouve anything. i deleted thoses bad pictures. i thougth they would never come again. then saw them the 9 sept. flotting above my house, very high in the sky around the airport. always the same first vessel with few red and white ligths under, that can almost be mistaken for airplane, unless you watch it fly. tried to ingore them but they keep appearing.I would like your help to make certain i am not going crazy. i am not equiped to take pictures at night time and i don't want to make people around me go crazy. i need professionnel help to document these happenings. it is like it is temporary. they are here often searching for something and always landing around the same place. they like to land in the industrial section of the city. these sites are always well lighted and innoccupied during night time. their light can pass unseen by thousands of citizens who don't even have a clue. i believe when they do find what ever... i don't think we will see them again. please contact me soon. i know you might receive thousands of letters like mine but i would sure appreciate to have some help
content.summary: Concert ufo

content.detailedDescription:
1) my girlfriend and i were camping in mount rainier national park eating a late dinner and observing the night sky. 

2) we noticed an object moving across the sky near a group of stars.

3) we knew it wasn't an air plane because it was to high up and there was no colored flashing tail lights. we knew it wasn't a satellite because this object had a wobble and shifted directions from southeast to northeast while stopping in its flight path hovering. we also know it wasn't a comet/meteor because it did not have any tail nor was it shaped like a teardrop. 

4) the object basically moved from north to south at a steady speed and then traveled back in the opposite direction but stopping in its flight path before taking off again diagonally across the sky.   

5) i got the impression that it was observing us or knew we were watching it from a distance, so i began to signal it by using a red flashlight pointed towards the object turning it on and off repeatedly. after about 5 minutes or so it took off quickly. the hairs on the back of my neck were standing up and i was excited by the possibility that it was a ufo. my girlfriend was nervous and a little scared.

6) we lost sight of the object when it took off at a high rate of speed behind the very tall trees that surrounded us.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo was moving southeasternly accross the sky and then stoped then proceeded in the oppisite direction with a wobble like movment.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking and i went around the track at my local high school like i do everyday. climbed up the bleachers to look over the football field where i had played when i was in high school. i took a picture from the 50 yard line and after looking at it i saw that there was an object in the picture. it appeared to have a head, two arms and two legs. hanging in the sky. i have an amazing picture i would like to share with an investigator. it is really amazing. had slightly fading legs and two bright lights on the object.
content.summary: Took a picture of an object that appeard to be a person hanging in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at about midnight to have a smoke and was looking at the stars because the sky was very very clear. then out of nowhere a light appeared to be moving up towards the ne from the nw. at first i thought it was a satellite but right behind it was a even brighter maybe even bigger, lighted object. it seemed to be following very closely to the smaller dimmer light. like it was chasing after it. the smaller dimmer light would change direction and after about a second or two the bigger brighter light would follow in direction. this went on for two minutes then they just went dark. lights were off. i knew what i seen was not normal. i sat there for about thirty more minutes to see if they would appear again. nothing. keep in mind, there was not a single cloud in the sky.
content.summary: Two lights. front light was not as bright as the one chasing it. disappeared after a few minutes. very odd movement. the one in front seemed to be trying to get away from the bigger brighter light.
